layer.html: A small helper tool for finding the[br]correct [a href='https://krpano.com/docu/xml/#depthmap.mapmode' style='color:#FFFFFF;']mapmode[/a], [a href='https://krpano.com/docu/xml/#depthmap.offset' style='color:#FFFFFF;']offset[/a], [a href='https://krpano.com/docu/xml/#depthmap.curve' style='color:#FFFFFF;']curve[/a] and [a href='https://krpano.com/docu/xml/#depthmap.scale' style='color:#FFFFFF;']scale[/a] settings[br]for a depthmap image.
